newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: RESEARCH ALERT-Avoid Abacus Consolidated-Asian Cap.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Avoid Abacus Consolidated-Asian Cap.

text.p: Stock brokerage Asian Capital Equities Inc on Tuesday reporting after a company visit to Abacus Consolidated Resources Inc (ABA) said: "ABA is avoid".
Asian Capital said it recommended investors avoid the stock until the firm revealed new corporate plans.
"The stock has no story to tell yet," it said.

Abacus Consolidated, which used to be Piedra Negra Mining Corporation, changed its name and purpose in 1989. It has significant stakes in Hedge Issues Management and Leverage Advisors (100% - holding firm), and Abacus Gaming Technologies Inc (66.33% - gaming and amusement firm) with minor interest in Suricon Resources Corporation (2% - mining and real estate).
Asian Capital said Hedge remains unoperational since its incorporation in 1990.

Abacus is one of the members that operates Pacific Online Systems Inc, which provides computer terminals and other related equipment for lottery operations in the Mindanao and Visayas region, it said.

Considering that Hedge remains inactive and that Abacus Gaming's lottery operations started just in June, 1996, the current price of 1.7 centavos is too expensive, Asian Capital analyst Michelle Benedicto said.
Abacus Consolidated shares have a par value of one centavo each. -- Manila newsroom (632) 841 8934
